name: MBIA Inc.
description: MBIA Inc. is a leading financial services company that specializes in providing insurance and financial guarantee products. Founded in 1973, MBIA has established itself as a prominent player in the municipal bond insurance market, offering protection against defaults on municipal bonds. The company operates primarily through its subsidiaries, which include MBIA Insurance Corporation and National Public Finance Guarantee Corporation. MBIA's core business involves insuring municipal bonds and other structured finance products, enabling issuers to lower their borrowing costs and enhance their credit ratings. Over the years, MBIA has expanded its services to include risk management and financial advisory solutions, catering to a diverse clientele that spans public and private sectors. The company is committed to maintaining financial stability and minimizing risk exposure while adhering to stringent regulatory standards. With a strong focus on innovation and customer service, MBIA continues to adapt to the evolving financial landscape, providing solutions that meet the needs of its clients. The company’s mission is to support infrastructure development and public service initiatives through its financial products, contributing to the overall economic growth and stability of communities.
